    • Method Detail

      • onSave

        boolean onSave​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        Save button click handler that validates appointment object and writes to database
        Specified by:
        onSave in class AppointmentController
        Parameters:
        event - button click event
        Returns:
        bool indicating success of appointment validation and database write

      • setUI

        private void setUI()
        Method to set UI components and retrieve automatically generated ID for new appointment. If a database error occurs, class member generateIDError is flagged as true in order for initialize method to handle the error and show an alert

      • initialize

        public void initialize​(java.net.URL url,
                       java.util.ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
        Override of standard JavaFX method to initialize UI. Sets UI and button handlers and checks if there was a database error with generating automatic appointment ID for new customer
        Parameters:
        url - The location used to resolve relative paths for the root object, or null if the location is not known.
        resourceBundle - The resources used to localize the root object, or null if the root object was not localized.
